des: "This is a wonderful, smooth and chocolaty hot fudge topping similar to the one sold for years at Sanders in Detroit, MI.  And yes, it really does use ice cream in the recipe!"
ins: In a double boiler over simmering water, combine milk and caramels.  Cook, stirring, until melted and smooth.  Stir in chocolate until smooth.  Stir in ice cream and vanilla until well blended.  Remove from heat.  Store in refrigerator.
